message:
Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Our product is valued at $1,200,000 by you, making it an invaluable asset. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive edge in the market while ensuring you maximize your returns on investment.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice
